oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French-made gold pocket watch
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gold pocket watch, serial no. 6047, manufactured by Francois Dubois & Co. The face is engraved with a town landscape. A harbor scene and a dog are engraved on the back and inside cover, respectively. According to family legend, Nathaniel Scott, upon his return home from the war, traded a horse for this watch. "Nathaniel Scott" and date "1856" are written on a piece of paper that accompanies the watch.
